Headline: #35 35th Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Pershing
ShortDescription: 35 35th buses are rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 31st, California, 36th Place, and resume normal route: due to police activity near Kedzie/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 31st, California, 36th Place, and resume normal route: due to police activity near Kedzie/Pershing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at South Blvd
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are standing at South Blvd due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are standing at South Blvd due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
